description:
cmd/go: clean test directories as they complete

A go build currently generates around 400MB of test output prior to
cleaning up. With this change we use a maximum of ~15MB.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=37f1db4386ab ***

cmd/go: clean test directories as they complete

A go build currently generates around 400MB of test output prior to
cleaning up. With this change we use a maximum of ~15MB.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5588044

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5588044: cmd/go: clean test directories as they complete
